Some of my arts and creations

"Sail to the sun"
An expression of life as sailing in the dark ocean towards the sunset

"One Eye Tear"
A tribute of sadness and tragedy during the COVID-19 Pandemic

"Mourning Pines"
A random expression painting of pine trees during my mourning period

"Serene Solitude"
A representation of a person meditating in solitude having a serenity and zen

"Dancing to the Symphony"
A women dancing to the symphony where a crowd is watching and metaphorical eyes
